title: Caught on Camera with the CEO
description: TO: All staff – Is this the hottest kiss you’ve ever seen? Finally our playboy boss plays around at work! Watch this steamy clip of Alex Carlisle getting down and dirty in the lift with the brand-new temp… Heart-throb Alex has recently been spotted prowling the office floor – is brunette bombshell Dani Russo the reason? From this sizzling encounter, we think so! Now Dani’s lost her job, and the office grapevine says our bad-boy boss has moved her into his bachelor pad and found her a job – but is an X-rated action replay on the cards?! Watch this space… Hot Under the Collar Naughty nights with the boss…
author: Natalie Anderson
